mapper.select: select `name` as countName, count(*) as countNumber from user_group ug join `group` gg on gg.companyId=#{companyId} and gg.id=ug.groupId GROUP BY groupId;
select sex as countName, count(*) as countNumber from staff sf join company cc on cc.id=#{companyId} and sf.companyId=cc.id GROUP BY sex;
select homeTown as countName, count(*) as countNumber from staff sf join company cc on cc.id=#{companyId} and sf.companyId=cc.id GROUP BY homeTown;
select salary as countName, count(*) as countNumber from staff sf join company cc on cc.id=#{companyId} and sf.companyId=cc.id GROUP BY salary;
select status as countName, count(*) as countNumber from staff sf join company cc on cc.id=#{param1} and to_days(sf.statusTime)=to_days(#{param2}) and sf.companyId=cc.id GROUP BY status
